attributes.action: allow any petition to be added to this site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitions should not be rejected for any reason. We live in a democracy and there is such a thing as freedom of speech. Why are some petitions rejected and others allowed? I petition the Prime Minister to allow public opinion to be on this site and stop rejecting petitions

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
